summary: New characters: Alexey Fyodorovitch, Dmitri. New connections: Katerina–Alyosha (connection through family), Alexey–Dmitri (brother), Ekaterina–Alyosha (friendship), Katerina–Agrafena (friend) and 3 more.
summary_short: Introduces Alexey Fyodorovitch and Dmitri. Alyosha Karamazov is the most connected figure (27 ties). Key relationship types: friendship, connection through family.
highlights: Most central: Alyosha Karamazov (27), Dmitri Karamazov (25), Fyodor Karamazov (24), Ivan Karamazov (20)
Key ties: Katerina–Alyosha (connection through family), Alexey–Dmitri (brother), Ekaterina–Alyosha (friendship), Katerina–Agrafena (friend), +3 more
story_summary: Alyosha visits Katerina Ivanovna to deliver a message from Dmitri and finds her excited and hopeful about saving Dmitri despite his troubles. Grushenka arrives, and a tense confrontation ensues between her and Katerina Ivanovna, ending with Grushenka leaving and Katerina Ivanovna breaking down in tears. Alyosha leaves the house deeply troubled, receiving a letter from Madame Hohlakov as he departs.
evidence_quotes: He told me to give you his compliments—and to say that he would never come again
Katerina Ivanovna went into a fit of hysterics. She sobbed, and was shaken with convulsions
